name: Warmog's Armor
tooltip:
Warmog's Armor

Cost: 3000
+800 Health
+200% Health per 5
+10 Ability Haste

Grants Warmog's Heart if you have at least 3000 maximum health.

UNIQUE Passive - Warmog's Heart: Regenerate [ 5% maximum health every second ][ 25% maximum health every 5 seconds ]if damage has not been taken in the last 6 seconds (3 seconds for damage from non-champions).
